title: $:/plugins/inmysocks/Citations
description: A basic citation tracker for TiddlyWiki
author: inmysocks
text:
{ "tiddlers": { "$:/plugins/inmysocks/Citations/Add Citation": { "caption": "Add Citation", "created": "20141205193053640", "creator": "inmysocks", "modified": "20141209013200270", "modifier": "inmysocks", "no_edit": "true", "title": "$:/plugins/inmysocks/Citations/Add Citation", "text": "\define thisGetIndex() $:/temp/AddCitation/SubjectsList##$(ThisTiddler)$ \end \define makeCitationText() Subjects:
    <$list filter='[[$(subjectsTiddler)$]indexes[]]'>
  • <$view field='title'/>
Abstract:
<$view tiddler="""$(abstractTiddler)$""" field='text'/> Bibtex: --- $(bibTex)$ --- \end \define makeAbstractTiddler() $(tiddlerTitle)$_Abstract \end \define makeBibTexTiddler() $(tiddlerTitle)$_BibTex \end \define makeSubjectsTiddler() $(tiddlerTitle)$_Subjects \end \define getBibTex() <$macrocall $name=monoSpacedCodeBlock src={{$(bibTexTiddler)$}}/> \end Paper Title: <$edit-text class='tc-edit-texteditor' tiddler='$:/state/addcitation' field='paper_title' placeholder='papertitle' size=70/>
Abstract:
<$edit-text class='tc-edit-texteditor' tiddler='$:/state/addcitation' placeholder='Abstract'/> Bibtex Citation:
<$edit-text class='tc-edit-texteditor' tiddler='$:/state/addcitation/bibtex' placeholder='BibTex Citation'/> <$set name=tiddlerTitle value={{$:/state/addcitation!!paper_title}}> <$set name=abstractTiddler value=<>> <$set name=bibTexTiddler value=<>> <$set name=subjectsTiddler value=<>> <$set name=bibTex value=<>> <$reveal type='nomatch' state='$:/state/addcition/addsubject' text='newsubject'> Subject: <$select tiddler='$:/state/addcitation/subject' default='No Subject'> <$list filter='[tag[CitationsSubject]]'> <$button>Add Subject <$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/temp/AddCitation/SubjectsList' $index={{$:/state/addcitation/subject}} $value='1'/> <$button set='$:/state/addcition/addsubject' setTo='newsubject'>New Subject <$reveal type='match' state='$:/state/addcition/addsubject' text='newsubject'> Subject Name: <$edit-text class='tc-edit-texteditor' tiddler='$:/state/addcition/addsubject' field='newsubjectname'/>
<$button>Add Subject <$action-setfield $tiddler={{$:/state/addcition/addsubject!!newsubjectname}} tags=CitationsSubject/> <$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/state/addcition/addsubject' $field='newsubjectname' $value=''/> <$button set='$:/state/addcition/addsubject' setTo='nonewsubject'>Done Current Subjects:
    <$list filter='[[$:/temp/AddCitation/SubjectsList]indexes[]]'> <$set name=ThisTiddler value=<>>
  • <$view field='title'/> <$button set=<>>Remove Subject
<$button>Add Citation <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text={{$:/state/addcitation}}/> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text={{$:/state/addcitation/bibtex}}/> <$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/temp/AddCitation/SubjectsList' $field='title' $value=<>/> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text=<>/> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> tags='Citations'/> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> subject_tiddler=<> bibtex_tiddler=<> abstract_tiddler=<>/> <$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/state/addcitation' text=''/><$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/state/addcitation' $field='paper_title' $value=''/><$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/state/addcitation/bibtex' text=''/> <$button>Clear Form <$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/state/addcitation' text=''/> <$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/state/addcitation' $field='paper_title' $value=''/> <$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/state/addcitation/bibtex' text=''/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="""I hope you don't name a tiddler this""" $field='title' $value="""$:/temp/AddCitation/SubjectsList"""/> " }, "$:/plugins/inmysocks/Citations/Citation Library": { "caption": "Citation Library", "created": "20141205200355907", "modified": "20141206180629653", "no_edit": "true", "tags": "Dashboard", "title": "$:/plugins/inmysocks/Citations/Citation Library", "text": "<>" }, "$:/plugins/inmysocks/Citations/Citations Macros": { "tags": "$:/tags/Macro", "title": "$:/plugins/inmysocks/Citations/Citations Macros", "text": "\define monoSpacedCodeBlock(src) ``` $src$ ``` \end" }, "$:/plugins/inmysocks/Citations/Citations": { "caption": "Citations", "created": "20141111191625685", "creator": "inmysocks", "modified": "20141209194846383", "modifier": "inmysocks", "no_edit": "true", "title": "$:/plugins/inmysocks/Citations/Citations", "text": "\define thisCitationEntry() <$checkbox tiddler=<> field='on_list' checked='true' unchecked='false'/> <$link to=<>><$view tiddler=<> field='title'/> \end \define thisCitationsList() <$reveal state='$:/state/viewcitation/subject' type='nomatch' text='alltitle'> <$reveal state='$:/state/viewcitation/subject' type='nomatch' text='allsubject'> <$list filter='[tag[Citations]regexp[(?i)$(searchString)$]]' variable=currentCitation> <$list filter='[titleget[subject_tiddler]]' variable=subjectsTiddler> <$list filter='[titleindexes[]]' variable=currentSubject> <$reveal type='match' state='$:/state/viewcitation/subject' text=<>> <>
<$reveal state='$:/state/viewcitation/subject' type='match' text='alltitle'> <$list filter='[tag[Citations]regexp[(?i)$(searchString)$]sort[title]]'> <>
<$reveal state='$:/state/viewcitation/subject' type='match' text='allsubject'> <$list filter='[tag[Citations]regexp[(?i)$(searchString)$]get[subject_tiddler]indexes[]]' variable=subjectsTiddler> <$list filter='[tag[Citations]regexp[(?i)$(searchString)$]sort[title]]' variable=currentCitation> <$list filter='[titleget[subject_tiddler]]' variable=innerSubjectsTiddler> <$list filter='[titleindexes[]]'> <$list filter='[titleis[current]]'> <>
Add to list <>
\end List Citations: Subject: <$select tiddler='$:/state/viewcitation/subject' default='All'> <$list filter='[tag[CitationsSubject]]'> (Search by Citation Name: <$edit-text tiddler='$:/temp/Citations/CitationSearch' field=search_text/>)
<$set name=searchString value={{$:/temp/Citations/CitationSearch!!search_text}}> <> " }, "$:/plugins/inmysocks/Citations/Edit Citations": { "caption": "Edit Citations", "creator": "inmysocks", "no_edit": "true", "title": "$:/plugins/inmysocks/Citations/Edit Citations", "text": "\define thisEditSubjects()
  • <$view field='title'/> <$button set='$(subjectTiddler)$##$(currentSubject)$'>Remove Subject
    • \end
    List of all tiddlers
    <$select tiddler='$:/state/CitationsLibrary/EditCitations/SelectedCitation'> <$list filter='[tag[Citations]]'>
    List by subject
    <$select tiddler='$:/state/CitationsLibrary/EditCitations/SelectedCitation'> <$list filter='[tag[Citations]get[subject_tiddler]indexes[]]' variable=subjectsTiddler> >> <$list filter='[tag[Citations]]' variable=currentCitation> <$list filter='[titleget[subject_tiddler]]' variable=innerSubjectsTiddler> <$list filter='[titleindexes[]]'> <$list filter='[titleis[current]]'>
    Abstract Tiddler
    <$edit-text tiddler={{$:/state/CitationsLibrary/EditCitations/SelectedCitation}} field='abstract_tiddler' class='tc-edit-texteditor'/>
    Bibtex Tiddler
    <$edit-text tiddler={{$:/state/CitationsLibrary/EditCitations/SelectedCitation}} field='bibtex_tiddler' class='tc-edit-texteditor'/>
    Note Tiddler
    <$edit-text tiddler={{$:/state/CitationsLibrary/EditCitations/SelectedCitation}} field='note_tiddler' class='tc-edit-texteditor'/>
    Subject Tiddler
    <$edit-text tiddler={{$:/state/CitationsLibrary/EditCitations/SelectedCitation}} field='subject_tiddler' class='tc-edit-texteditor'/>
    Citation Title: {{$:/state/CitationsLibrary/EditCitations/SelectedCitation}} <$tiddler tiddler={{$:/state/CitationsLibrary/EditCitations/SelectedCitation}}> Abstract: <$edit-text tiddler={{!!abstract_tiddler}} class='tc-edit-texteditor'/> Bibtex: <$edit-text tiddler={{!!bibtex_tiddler}} class='tc-edit-texteditor'/> Notes: <$edit-text tiddler={{!!note_tiddler}} class='tc-edit-texteditor'/> Subjects: <$reveal type='nomatch' state='$:/state/editcition/addsubject' text='newsubject'> Subject: <$select tiddler='$:/state/editcitation/subject' default='No Subject'> <$list filter='[tag[CitationsSubject]]'> <$button>Add Subject <$action-setfield $tiddler={{!!subject_tiddler}} $index={{$:/state/editcitation/subject}} $value='1'/> <$button set='$:/state/editcition/addsubject' setTo='newsubject'>New Subject <$reveal type='match' state='$:/state/editcition/addsubject' text='newsubject'> Subject Name: <$edit-text class='tc-edit-texteditor' tiddler='$:/state/editcition/addsubject' field='newsubjectname'/>
    <$button>Add Subject <$action-setfield $tiddler={{$:/state/editcition/addsubject!!newsubjectname}} tags=CitationsSubject/> <$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/state/editcition/addsubject' $field='newsubjectname' $value=''/> <$button set='$:/state/editcition/addsubject' setTo='nonewsubject'>Done <$set name=subjectTiddler value={{!!subject_tiddler}}>
      <$list filter='[{!!subject_tiddler}indexes[]]'> <$set name=currentSubject value=<>> <>
    " }, "$:/plugins/inmysocks/Citations/Selected Citations BibTex": { "caption": "Selected Citations BibTex", "created": "20150211015009814", "modified": "20150211020128946", "tags": "", "title": "$:/plugins/inmysocks/Citations/Selected Citations BibTex", "text": " " }, "$:/plugins/inmysocks/Citations/Selected Citations": { "caption": "Selected Citations", "created": "20150211014749620", "modified": "20150211020337930", "tags": "", "title": "$:/plugins/inmysocks/Citations/Selected Citations", "text": "\define thisCitationEntry() <$checkbox tiddler=<> field='on_list' checked='true' unchecked='false'/><$link to=<>><$view tiddler=<> field='title'/> \end This is the list of currently selected citations whose ~BibTex entries will be displayed in the ~BibTex List tab. <$list filter='[tag[Citations]on_list[true]]'> <>
    Remove from listCitation
    " }, "$:/plugins/inmysocks/Citations/Upgrade Citations from 0.1.x to 0.2.x": { "no_edit": "true", "title": "$:/plugins/inmysocks/Citations/Upgrade Citations from 0.1.x to 0.2.x", "text": "\define makeCitationText() Subjects:
      <$list filter='[[$(subjectsTiddler)$]indexes[]]'>
    • <$view field='title'/>
    Abstract:
    <$view tiddler="""$(abstractTiddler)$""" field='text'/> Bibtex: --- $(bibTex)$ --- \end \define thisMakeBibtexTiddler() $(currentTitle)$_BibTex \end \define thisMakeAbstractTiddler() $(currentTitle)$_Abstract \end \define thisMakeSubjectTiddler() $(currentTitle)$_Subject \end \define getBibTex() <$macrocall $name=monoSpacedCodeBlock src={{$(bibTexTiddler)$}}/> \end <$select tiddler='$:/state/UpgradeCitation/selectedtiddler'> <$list filter='[tag[Citations]has[subject]]'> <$tiddler tiddler={{$:/state/UpgradeCitation/selectedtiddler}}> <$set name=currentTitle value=<>> <$set name=bibTexTiddler value=<>> <$set name=subjectsTiddler value=<>> <$set name=bibTex value=<>> <$set name=abstractTiddler value=<>> <$button>Upgrade <$action-setfield bibtex_tiddler=<> abstract_tiddler=<> subject_tiddler=<>/> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> $index={{!!subject}} $value=1/> <$action-setfield text=<>/> " }, "$:/plugins/inmysocks/Citations/View Citation by Subject": { "caption": "View Citation by Subject", "creator": "inmysocks", "no_edit": "true", "title": "$:/plugins/inmysocks/Citations/View Citation by Subject", "text": "\define thisNoteTiddler() <$list filter='[!has[note_tiddler]]'> <$button>Create Note Tiddler <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text=''/> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> note_tiddler=<>/> <$list filter='[has[note_tiddler]]'> <$edit-text tiddler={{!!note_tiddler}} class='tc-edit-texteditor' minHeight={{$:/state/viewcitation/noteheight}} placeholder='Citation Notes'/> \end \define thisNoteTiddlerName() $(CitationTiddler)$_notes \end Subject: <$select tiddler='$:/state/viewcitation/subject' default='No Subject'> <$list filter='[tag[CitationsSubject]sort[title]]'> Note area height: <$select tiddler='$:/state/viewcitation/noteheight'><$list filter='50px 100px 200px 300px 400px 500px 600px 700px'> Citation: <$select tiddler='$:/state/viewcitation/citationbysubject'> <$list filter='[tag[Citations]sort[title]]' variable=currentCitation> <$list filter='[titleget[subject_tiddler]]' variable=subjectsTiddler> <$list filter='[titleindexes[]]'> <$list filter='[title{$:/state/viewcitation/subject}is[current]]'> <$set name=CitationTiddler value={{$:/state/viewcitation/citationbysubject}}>
    <><$transclude tiddler=<> mode='block'/>
    " }, "$:/plugins/inmysocks/Citations/View Citation by Title": { "caption": "View Citation by Title", "creator": "inmysocks", "no_edit": "true", "title": "$:/plugins/inmysocks/Citations/View Citation by Title", "text": "\define thisNoteTiddler() <$list filter='[!has[note_tiddler]]'> <$button>Create Note Tiddler <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text=''/> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> note_tiddler=<>/> <$list filter='[has[note_tiddler]]'> <$edit-text tiddler={{!!note_tiddler}} class='tc-edit-texteditor' minHeight={{$:/state/viewcitation/noteheight}} placeholder='Citation Notes'/> \end \define thisNoteTiddlerName() $(CitationTiddler)$_notes \end Citation: <$select tiddler='$:/state/viewcitation/citationbytitle'> <$list filter='[tag[Citations]sort[title]]'> <$set name=CitationTiddler value={{$:/state/viewcitation/citationbytitle}}>
    <><$transclude tiddler=<> mode='block'/>
    " }, "$:/plugins/inmysocks/Citations/View Citation": { "caption": "View Citation", "creator": "inmysocks", "no_edit": "true", "title": "$:/plugins/inmysocks/Citations/View Citation", "text": "<>" } } }
name: Citations
